menuitem.name: Etiqueta _Div
menuitem.enabled: (dw.getActiveWindow(true) != null && dw.getActiveWindow(true).allowsEdits()) && dw.getFocus() != 'browser' && dw.getDocumentDOM() != null && dw.getDocumentDOM().getParseMode() == 'html'

menuitem.name: Div _PA
menuitem.enabled: (dw.getActiveWindow(true) != null && dw.getActiveWindow(true).allowsEdits()) && dw.getFocus() != 'browser' && dw.getDocumentDOM() != null && dw.getDocumentDOM().getParseMode() == 'html' && !dw.getDocumentDOM().getShowLayoutView()
